K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:40b-1: a'arya aashta manda la ka n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:40b-3: 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:40b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:40b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:40b-7: bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba zhes @41a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41a-1: bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41a-2: chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41a-3: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41a-4: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41a-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41a-7: rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41a-11: de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41a-12: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41a-14: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41a-17: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgyad pa bgyid par 'tshal na des ji ltar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-0: @41b bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-2: khyod skye bo mang po la shin tu phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-3: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-4: dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-6: khyod spobs pa skyes pa ni bzang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-10: de'i phyir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga 'byang zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-11: dngos grub thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-12: aom mah'a h'um ma h'a p'i ra sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-13: snying po 'dis ni dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-14: aom hr'i:h'um padma pri ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-15: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-16: aom mee tri ha ra na sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-18: aom aa k'a sha garbha ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-20: aom ma sva hri r'a dza ya dzva sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-21: kun tu bzang po'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-22: aom ku ru bha na ra ha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-23: lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-24: aom shr'i aam ram ga sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-25: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-26: aom ni sva ram bha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-27: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-28: aom kshi ti ha r'a dz'a sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-29: sa'i snying po'i snying po ste byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:41b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa 'di rigs kyi bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:42a-2: dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du lan gcig brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:42a-3: de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:42a-4: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:42a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:42a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yi rangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:42a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:42a-8: 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:42a-9: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-018:42a-11: zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
